description: Strawberry vibes meet real fizzy flavor for a burst of berry bliss. Made with real fruit juice from concentrate, this prebiotic drink contains 6 grams of prebiotic fiber to support gut health, zinc and vitamin C to support immune health, no added sugar, and additional ingredients. It's also non-GMO and sweetened with real fruit juice and monk fruit extract.
